mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dm_test.t_user (user_id, password, nickname, email, mobile, birth, interest) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{birth}, #{interest})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, nickname, email, mobile, birth, interest, created_at FROM dm_test.t_user WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND password = #{password}
